CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The combination effects of the DPP to TPD ratio with changes in the alkyl chain could affect the π-π stacking distance of P1 , P3 , P4 , P5 , and P7 and backbone planarity , thus influencing their charge transport properties.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| DPP (Diphenyl-para-phenylene) |
| TPD (Thiophene-para-thiophene) |
| P1 |
| P3 |
| P4 |
| P5 |
| P7 |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| DPP (Diphenyl-para-phenylene) |
| TPD (Thiophene-para-thiophene) |
| P1 |
| P3 |
| P4 |
| P5 |
| P7 |

(Note: The original paragraph mentions "these materials" in the beginning, but it's not explicitly stated which materials are being referred to other than the mentioned names. Assuming that the mentioned names are the materials of interest, they are the valid entities in this context.)

Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The combination effects of the DPP to TPD ratio with changes in the alkyl chain could affect the π-π stacking distance of P1 , P3 , P4 , P5 , and P7 and backbone planarity , thus influencing their charge transport properties.

Let's think step by step.

| --- |

| π-π stacking distance of P1 |
| π-π stacking distance of P3 |
| π-π stacking distance of P4 |
| π-π stacking distance of P5 |
| π-π stacking distance of P7 |
| Backbone planarity |
| Charge transport properties |
| Of P1 |
| Of P3 |
| Of P4 |
| Of P5 |
| Of P7 |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

| Property Name |
| --- |
| DPP to TPD ratio |
| π-π stacking distance of P1 |
| π-π stacking distance of P3 |

| Charge transport properties of P4 |
| Charge transport properties of P5 |
| Charge transport properties of P7 |

Note: In the original paragraph, "could affect" and "thus influencing" suggest that the mentioned properties have an impact on each other. Therefore, I assumed that the charge transport properties are also material properties. If this is not the case, then the last six entries in the table should be removed.
